Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Narragansett/Addison
ShortDescription: SB 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Addison, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett near Narragansett/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Addison, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett due to, street blockage near Narragansett/Addison.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie, #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 59th, California, 55th and Kedzie: due to, fire department activity near Kedzie/56th.
